welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Southborough, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private jet and charter flights, offering luxurious lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
